snippet: BATLLE--Luis. Three generations of musicians, audiences and the family members of the Marlboro Music School and Festival mourn the loss of their beloved musician, pianist and friend who shared his wisdom, artistry, his humor and humanity with rare generosity. Our hearts reach out to his wonderfully compassionate and loving wife Geraldine Pittman de Batlle, his children Eliza, Luis, Leopoldo and Jorge and his grandchildren. His spirit lives on through all those he touched. The Marlboro Music Family Mitsuko Uchida, Artistic Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: BATLLE--Luis. Three generations of musicians, audiences and the family members of the Marlboro Music School and Festival mourn the loss of their beloved musician, pianist and friend who shared his wisdom, artistry, his humor and humanity with rare generosity. Our hearts reach out to his wonderfully compassionate and loving wife Geraldine Pittman de Batlle, his children Eliza, Luis, Leopoldo and Jorge and his grandchildren. His spirit lives on through all those he touched. The Marlboro Music Family Mitsuko Uchida, Artistic Director 1/3
